text: Kladognathus is an extinct genus of conodonts. == References == * The Kladognathus Apparatus (Conodonta, Carboniferous): Homologies with Ozarkodinids, and the Prioniodinid Bauplan. Mark A. Purnell, Journal of Paleontology, Vol. 67, No. 5 (Sep., 1993), pages 875-882 (Stable URL) * Kladognathus Rexroad, 1958, not Cladognathodus Rexroad and Collinson, 1961. Michael C. Mound, Micropaleontology, July 1965, volume 11, issue 3 (abstract) == External links == * Category:Prioniodontida genera Category:Fossil taxa described in 1958
title: Kladognathus
